text: Imagine a vast sheet of paper on which straight Lines. Triangles Squares; Pentagons; Hexagons. and other figures; instead of remaining fixed in their places: move freely about. on o1 in the surface but without the power of rising above O1 sinking below it; very much like shadows only hard and with luminous and you will then have a pretty correct notion of my country and countrymen.
